PLATINUMMOBILESPA

A service that can only be provided in Barbados.

Who we are...

This spa is a representation of everything that is Barbados. It is place of hospitality, peace and care. We give off an island vibe that is sure to excite you. Through the stimulation of your senses, we look to give you an experience that defines your time on island.

Our goal...

Through different spa services we hope to give your vacation a refreshing feeling. The goal is to lead the mind, body, and soul to a place of improvement. The treatments that are offered here are implented in a way that come from elements of Bajan life. Its an experience that is as soft and cool as the ocean breeze and warm and soothing like the beach sands. This is our thank you to you for choosing Barbados as your get away place.

What makes us different...

We are a grassroots spa service. We are created from the hearts and minds of Barbadians who pride themselves on giving you the best spa experience possible. We look forward to your enjoyment just as we enjoy working to entertain you.
